name: SPACE DEFENSE 3000
description:
Kill enemies to get coins, buy upgrades and defeat the evil Tri!

Controls:

E- Stasis (if unlocked)

RMB- Block projectiles

Spacebar- Swing your sword to defeat armored foes!

LMB- Kill special enemies (you'll know when you see them)

Have fun!

PS: There may or may not be a secret on the title screen.
